subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
lead_paragraph: The Triple Crown champion American Pharoah will try to close out his career in style by winning the $5 million Breeders’ Cup Classic next week.
snippet: The Triple Crown champion American Pharoah will try to close out his career in style by winning the $5 million Breeders’ Cup Classic next week.
